channel.title: Loading Cache

item.title: Loading Cache
item.dc:creator: @Blood_zeus Blood zeus
item.description:
@Blood_zeus wrote:

Anyone have an idea on how to load this onto the same directory as the client. (Client grabbing cache from within the client files)

[code]public static String findcachedir()
{
boolean exists = (new File(System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/Cache/”)).exists();
if (exists) {

		return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/Cache/";
	} else {
		File f = new File(System.getProperty("user.home") + "/Cache/");
		f.mkdir();
		return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/Cache/";
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
